items.sentence: The dogs began to howl when Tom started to sing.
Tom blamed Mary even though it wasn't her fault.
I'll come and pick you up at your place at 2:30.
Do you really believe it's absolutely necessary?
I don't want to be involved with anyone anymore.
These days everything I do is bad for my health.
If you need a fountain pen, I will lend you one.
The girls were sitting right next to each other.
There's nothing that can't be bought with money.
I began to play the saxophone when I was thirty.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all made for the door.
It was much easier for Tom to do it than for us.
I don't remember anything. I must've passed out.
I still haven't found a place to live in Boston.
Many of our employees can't even pay their rent.
Tom is the one that needs to make that decision.
I don't speak French as well as I speak English.
I speak French about as well as I speak English.
How long has it been since you've talked to Tom?
I'm studying several languages at the same time.
